articles.author: The Weather Channel
articles.title: World Malaria Day: India Achieves 66% Reduction In Its Malaria Burden | Weather.com - The Weather Channel
articles.description: In 2021, India accounted for 79% of all malaria cases in Southeast Asia, and about 83% of all malaria deaths in the region, as per WHO's World Malaria Report 2022.
articles.content:
India's vision to be malaria-free by 2027 and to eliminate the disease by 2030 is possible, but some challenges remain, said experts on World Malaria Day.
The country has made tremendous progress in… [+4878 chars]
